statements: UPDATE competitor_data SET brand_performance=8.7 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE competitor_data SET marketing_strategy_adjustments='Revamped marketing plan' WHERE competitor_name='Company X';
UPDATE competitor_data SET brand_performance = 9.5, marketing_strategy_adjustments = 'Enhanced digital marketing' WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor X'
UPDATE competitor_data SET marketing_strategy_adjustments = 'Increased social media ad spending', brand_performance = 8.7 WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor Y'
UPDATE competitors SET revenue = 5000000.00, employees = 200 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE brand_performance SET clicks = 1000, impressions = 5000 WHERE brand_id = 2 AND date = '2022-05-20';
UPDATE competitors SET industry='Technology', revenue=1500000, employees=500 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE brand_performance SET impressions=10000, clicks=5000 WHERE brand_id=1 AND date='2022-03-15';
UPDATE competitor_data SET revenue = 15000 WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE brand_performance SET performance_score = 8.5, performance_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE brand_name = 'XYZ Brand';
UPDATE competitor_data SET revenue = 1500000, market_share = 0.25 WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE brand_performance SET performance_score = 8.7, performance_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE brand_name = 'XYZ Brand';
UPDATE competitor_data SET value = 10.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE brand_performance SET performance_metric = 'Engagement' WHERE brand_name = 'Brand X';
UPDATE competitor_data SET value = 500, competitor_name = 'New Competitor' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE brand_performance SET value = 750, timestamp = NOW(), brand_name = 'Updated Brand' WHERE performance_metric = 'Sales';
UPDATE competitors SET reputation = 80 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE brand_metrics SET revenue = 100000, market_share = 0.25 WHERE brand_id = 4 AND date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE competitors SET name = 'New Competitor Name', reputation = 85 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE brand_metrics SET market_share = 0.25, customer_satisfaction = 90, revenue = 75000 WHERE id = 2;
